statements: SELECT * FROM employee_leave_balances ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, vacation_days FROM employee_leave_balances WHERE vacation_days > 10;
SELECT * FROM employee_leave_balances WHERE vacation_days < 5 AND sick_days > 3;
SELECT employee_id, vacation_days + sick_days AS total_leave_days FROM employee_leave_balances;
SELECT employee_id, CASE WHEN vacation_days > 5 THEN 'Vacation' ELSE 'Sick' END AS leave_type FROM employee_leave_balances ORDER BY leave_type DESC;
SELECT employee_id, vacation_days FROM employee_leave_balances WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_leave_balances WHERE vacation_days > 10;
SELECT employee_id, vacation_days, sick_days FROM employee_leave_balances ORDER BY vacation_days DESC;
SELECT employee_id, vacation_days, sick_days FROM employee_leave_balances WHERE vacation_days < 5 OR sick_days < 3;
SELECT AVG(vacation_days) AS average_vacation_days, AVG(sick_days) AS average_sick_days FROM employee_leave_balances;
SELECT * FROM employee_leave_balances
SELECT employee_id, vacation_balance FROM employee_leave_balances WHERE vacation_balance > 0
SELECT employee_id, sick_balance FROM employee_leave_balances ORDER BY employee_id ASC
SELECT employee_id, vacation_accrual_rate, accrual_date FROM leave_accruals WHERE vacation_accrual_rate > 0.5
SELECT employee_id, vacation_balance, sick_balance FROM employee_leave_balances ORDER BY sick_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_leave_balances WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT employee_id, vacation_balance FROM employee_leave_balances WHERE vacation_balance > 10 ORDER BY vacation_balance DESC;
SELECT employee_id, vacation_balance, sick_balance FROM employee_leave_balances WHERE vacation_balance > 5 AND sick_balance < 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_leave_balances JOIN leave_accruals ON employee_leave_balances.employee_id = leave_accruals.employee_id WHERE leave_accruals.accrual_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT employee_id, SUM(vacation_accrual_rate) AS total_vacation_accrual, SUM(sick_accrual_rate) AS total_sick_accrual FROM leave_accruals GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_vacation_accrual > 20 AND total_sick_accrual < 10;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT id, name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, start_date FROM employees ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT e.name, l.vacation_balance, a.vacation_accrual FROM employees e JOIN leave_balances l ON e.id = l.employee_id JOIN accruals a ON e.id = a.employee_id WHERE l.vacation_balance > 10;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, department FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC

SELECT e.name, lb.vacation_balance, a.vacation_accrual FROM employees e JOIN leave_balances lb ON e.id = lb.employee_id JOIN accruals a ON e.id = a.employee_id WHERE lb.vacation_balance > 10 AND a.vacation_accrual > 5
SELECT e.name, COUNT(lb.id) AS leave_entries FROM employees e LEFT JOIN leave_balances lb ON e.id = lb.employee_id GROUP BY e.name HAVING COUNT(lb.id) > 2
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, leave_balance FROM Employee ORDER BY leave_balance DESC;
SELECT employee_name, vacation_balance, sick_balance FROM LeaveBalances WHERE vacation_balance > 20 AND sick_balance < 10;
SELECT employee_name, leave_hours FROM LeaveTransactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM LeaveAccrualHistory ORDER BY accrual_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, leave_balance FROM Employee
SELECT * FROM LeaveTransactions WHERE employee_id = 1001
SELECT employee_name, vacation_balance, sick_balance FROM Employee e JOIN LeaveBalances lb ON e.employee_id = lb.employee_id
SELECT LT.transaction_id, LT.leave_type, LB.vacation_balance FROM LeaveTransactions LT JOIN LeaveBalances LB ON LT.employee_id = LB.employee_id
SELECT employee_name, vacation_accrual, accrual_date FROM Employee e JOIN LeaveAccrualHistory AH ON e.employee_id = AH.employee_id ORDER BY accrual_date DESC
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees
SELECT employee_id, email, department FROM employees
SELECT * FROM vacation_requests WHERE status='approved'
SELECT vacation_start_date, vacation_end_date FROM vacation_requests WHERE vacation_end_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department, first_name;
SELECT employee_id, leave_type, balance FROM leave_balances WHERE balance > 20 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, l.leave_type, l.accrual_rate FROM employees e JOIN leave_accruals l ON e.employee_id = l.employee_id;

SELECT r.request_id, r.employee_id, r.vacation_start_date, r.vacation_end_date, r.status, e.first_name, e.last_name FROM vacation_requests r JOIN employees e ON r.employee_id = e.employee_id ORDER BY r.vacation_start_date ASC;
